mission_summary: A simple Python script that prints a random inspirational quote from a predefined list.

files.task: The main entry point of the application. It orchestrates loading quotes, selecting a random one, and printing it to the console.
Stores configuration variables, such as the path to the file containing inspirational quotes.
Handles the logic for loading quotes from a file and selecting a random quote from the loaded list.
A plain text file containing a list of inspirational quotes, with each quote on a new line.
Lists all Python package dependencies required for the project. For this project, it will be empty as only built-in modules are used.
Provides a comprehensive overview of the project, including its purpose, how to set it up, how to run it, and how to extend the quote list.
